alert.note: Alert for Assumption; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:37PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. John The Baptist, south central Ascension, St. James, St. Charles, northwestern Lafourche, northwestern Jefferson and Assumption Parishes through 745 PM CDT... At 637 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Donaldsonville to 9 miles northeast of Norco. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Reserve, Hahnville, Laplace, Avondale, Metairie, Jefferson, Harahan, Gramercy, Lutcher, Montz, Luling, Garyville, River Ridge, Boutte, Supreme, Ama and Chackbay. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 193 and 226. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 6. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension
